Name: Glass Tower
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemon-lime soda.
Review: A heady, slightly sweet combination of spirits and liqueurs.
Nutrition: One serving of Glass Tower contains 227 calories
Garnish: Either no garnish or a peach wedge
